mapper.insert: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnNetwkSwtch.insertRnNetwkSwtch */ INSERT INTO RN_NETWK_SWTCH ( VM_SEQ /* 가상서버시퀀스 */ , NETWK_TY_CL_CD /* 네트워크유형구분코드 */ , INSTITUTION_ID /* 기관ID */ , UPPER_VM_SEQ /* 상위가상서버시퀀스 */ , DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ ) VALUES ( #{vmSeq} /* 가상서버시퀀스 */ , #{netwkTyClCd} /* 네트워크유형구분코드 */ , #{institutionId} /* 기관ID */ , #{upperVmSeq} /* 상위가상서버시퀀스 */ , 'N' )
mapper.update: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnNetwkSwtch.updateRnNetwkSwtch */ UPDATE RN_NETWK_SWTCH SET INSTITUTION_ID = #{institutionId} /* 기관ID */ WHERE VM_SEQ = #{vmSeq} /* 가상서버시퀀스 */

/* ncis.sql.cmn.rnNetwkSwtch.updateNetVmInst */
UPDATE RN_NETWK_SWTCH A SET UPPER_VM_SEQ = ( SELECT VM_SEQ FROM RN_NETWK_SWTCH B WHERE B.INSTITUTION_ID = A.INSTITUTION_ID AND B.NETWK_TY_CL_CD = '01' AND DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT 1 ) WHERE INSTITUTION_ID = #{institutionId} /* 기관ID */ AND NETWK_TY_CL_CD = '02' AND VM_SEQ = #{vmSeq}
